response.overview: We recorded a carnival in public space, where official culture meets grassroots’ entertainment. This is a time of craziness and numbness. Everybody wants to escape his or her own body and life. Happiness has become an amplified, twisted feeling of relief for individuals. Some are inappropriate and full of doubt. All of them constitute a sad and fantastic image. Are we free now or are we caged more than ever before?
response.title: In the Park
